title: Talpe Bare Land - LIP 160
details: LIP-160 An almost square piece of land set back from the seafront, flat and ready for development. This 105 Perch property is only 3 minutes drive to nearest swimmable beach of Habaraduwa and Talpe. The property has a very good access road and is 250m from the main Matara Galle Road. A very good piece of land for a boutique villa development, there are many foreign owned villas in the immediate surroundings.
